title: Bliss Spa Experience at the W Hotel in Hong Kong
description: Reward yourself with a luxurious spa day in Hong Kong and head to W Hotel's premier Bliss Spa! Book any of their treatments via Klook and give yourself the treatment you deserve!
summary: Indulge yourself for a day while in Hong Kong and try the premium relaxation services of Bliss® Spa. This spa haven is located on the 72nd floor of the W Hong Kong hotel, offering breathtaking views of the city. Explore the 14,500 sq ft of their tension-fighting facilities, which comes with nine harbor view treatment rooms, including two couple suites. Take your pick between 24 Carat Gold and Collagen Facial or  Diamond Rose Deluxe Meridian Massage, both of which come with complimentary use of Bliss® Spa’s dry sauna and access to their seasonal buffet snack. If you’re looking for a cool way to work out, avail of the WET® pool day pass and swim at the highest outdoor pool in the city! Book via Klook for a day of wellness that you deserve.
highlights: Feel like royalty for a day in Hong Kong and treat yourself to the top-notch services of Bliss® Spa at W Hong Kong
Give your face the VIP treatment it deserves with their 24 Carat Gold and Collagen Facial that will make you glow
Enjoy a head-to-toe pampering session and opt for their Diamond Rose Deluxe Meridian Massage
Admire a breathtaking view of the city while enjoying a refreshing dip at the highest outdoor pool in Hong Kong
Call Bliss® Spa (+85237172797) for reservation after purchasing voucher
Operating hours is subject to change based on HKSAR government’s most updated policies

location.address: Hong Kong, HK Kowloon Tsim Sha Tsui W Hong Kong, 1 Austin Road West, Kowloon Station
